DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to compare the effect of a hospital group-based vs. home-based combined exercise-diet program for the treatment of childhood obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Group Vs. Home-Based Combined Exercise-Diet Program In Childhood Obesity: A Randomised Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: caucasian overweight/obese Subjects with severe obesity (zscore above 2.5)
